SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT019
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message notifies the sender that the system has been unable to deliver the message specified in the <text-block>, and has been forced to abort it instead.
If the aborted message contains a field tag 103 (in the User Header) or was copied through FINInform in Y-copy mode, the field tag 619 containing a copy of the field tag 103 is added to the MT 019 format. This applies to all codes recorded in a field tag 103.
From: FIN To: User

SystemField.Name: inputTime
SystemField.description: Input time, local to the sender, of the aborted message.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: time
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Date and time are always given as local, unless otherwise specified. Local time for the SWIFT Network is in GMT.

SystemField.Name: mir
SystemField.description:
MIR of the aborted message, containing:
a) Input date
b) Input LT including branch code
c) Session number
d) ISN

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: mir
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
MIR of the aborted message, containing:
a) Input date
b) Input LT including branch code
c) Session number
d) ISN

SystemField.Name: mur
SystemField.description: Contains one of the following: 1.Message User Reference as used in the header of the original message if present. 2. If no message user reference was present in the original message, this tag may contain the contents of field 20 of the original message or (for Category 5 messages only) the contents of field 20C, with the code word SEME, but only when all alphabetical characters are in upper case.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: mur
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Message User Reference as used in the header of the original message

SystemField.Name: swift-address
SystemField.description: Complete 12-character destination, including logical terminal code and branch code, of the aborted message.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: swift-address
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Complete 12-character address, including LT code and branch code, or default branch code XXX.

SystemField.Name: mor
SystemField.description:
MOR reference of the aborted message,containing:
a) Output date
b) Output LT including branch code
c) Session number
d) OSN If more than one delivery attempt has been made, field 107 contains the last valid message output reference.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: mor
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Message output reference of the aborted message, containing:
a) Output date
b) Output LT including branch code
c) Session number
d) OSN

SystemField.Name: abort-reason
SystemField.description: Reason for the abort. See the FIN Error Codes for the full set of error codes.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: abort-reason
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Reason for the abort, and, for the SWIFTNet FIN Copy Service, reason for message refusals. See the SWIFTNet FIN Error Codes module for the full set of error codes.

SystemField.Name: service-code
SystemField.description: Service code of the aborted message
